field.name: summary
field.value: Build Error for Keyfiles in Directories with Spaces

field.name: description
field.value: The common.project.xml build configuration does not quote the keyfile, which causes build errors when the project in located in a directory with space. Which by default, Visual Studio uses $user\Documents\Visual Studio 2008\... which obviously has spaces.

comment.author: stevendelapena
comment.text: Attached is a patch that corrects this problem.

comment.author: stevendelapena
comment.text:
Hmmm... attaching files doesn't seem to work. Here's the patch:
Index: common-project.xml =================================================================== --- common-project.xml (revision 5283) +++ common-project.xml (working copy) @@ -141,7 +141,7 @@ <sources refid="project.sources" /> <references refid="project.references" /> <resources refid="project.resources" /> - <arg line="${csc.keyfile}" if="${assembly.sign}" /> + <arg line=""${csc.keyfile}"" if="${assembly.sign}" /> <arg line="${csc.args}" /> </csc> </if> @@ -187,7 +187,7 @@ <sources refid="project.sources" /> <references refid="project.references" /> <resources refid="project.resources" /> - <arg line="${csc.keyfile}" if="${assembly.sign}" /> + <arg line=""${csc.keyfile}"" if="${assembly.sign}" /> <arg line="${csc.args}" /> </csc> </target> @@ -204,7 +204,7 @@ <property overwrite="false" name="assembly.version" value="${project.major}.${project.minor}.${project.build}.0" /> <property overwrite="false" name="assembly.version.informational" value="${assembly.major}.${assembly.minor}.${assembly.build}.${svn.revision}" /> <property overwrite="false" name="assembly.copyright" value="Castle Project, original author or authors" /> - <property overwrite="false" name="assembly.keyfile" value="${key.file}" /> + <property overwrite="false" name="assembly.keyfile" value=""${key.file}"" /> <property overwrite="false" name="assembly.sign" value="${sign}" /> </target>
